context.name: Teamcenter
context.value: <?xml version="1.0"?> <xsl:stylesheet version="1.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" > <xsl:output method="xml" encoding="utf-8" indent="yes"/> <xsl:template match="@id|@keyref|@conkeyref"> <xsl:attribute name="{local-name()}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with(string(), 'TOPIC_')"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('X', substring(string(), 7))" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string()" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@href"> <xsl:attribute name="{local-name()}"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="starts-with(string(), '#TOPIC_')"> <xsl:value-of select="concat('#X', substring(string(), 8))" /> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="string()" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="*[@conkeyref and @href='-dita-use-conref-target']/@conkeyref"/> <xsl:template match="*[@conkeyref and @href='-dita-use-conref-target']/@conref"/> <xsl:template match="*[@conkeyref and @href='-dita-use-conref-target']/@href"/> <xsl:template match="*[@conkeyref and @href='-dita-use-conref-target']"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*"/> <xsl:attribute name='conref'> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before(concat('X', substring(@conkeyref, 7)), '/')" /> <xsl:text>.dita#</xsl:text> <xsl:value-of select="concat('X', substring(@conkeyref, 7))" /> </xsl:attribute> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:variable name="schema"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="count(*)=1"><xsl:value-of select="local-name(*)" /></xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise>ditabase</xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="public"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$schema='concept'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Concept//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='ditabase'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Composite//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='glossary'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Glossary//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='reference'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Reference//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='task'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Task//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='topic'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Topic//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='troubleshooting'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Troubleshooting//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='generalTask'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA General Task//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='glossgroup'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Glossary Group//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='machineryTask'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Machinery Task//EN</xsl:when> <xsl:when test="$schema='ditabase'">-//OASIS//DTD DITA Composite//EN</xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:variable> <xsl:text> </xsl:text> <xsl:value-of disable-output-escaping="yes" select="concat('&marklt;!DOCTYPE ', $schema, ' PUBLIC &markquot;', $public, '&markquot; &markquot;', $schema, '.dtd&markquot;&markgt;')"/><xsl:text> </xsl:text> <xsl:apply-templates select="node()" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@* | node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@* | node()"/> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>
